static Matrix choleskyDecompose(Matrix m)
          Performs a Cholesky decomposition, which writes a positive definite Hermitian matrix in terms of a lower triangular matrix and its conjugate transpose

          Computes and returns the LU decomposition of the matrix
static Matrix[] QRDecompose(Matrix m)
          Performs a QR decomposition on the given square matrix, writing a matrix as a product of a unitary matrix Q and upper triangular matrix R

Method Detail

QRDecompose

public static Matrix[] QRDecompose(Matrix m)
                            throws NotSquareException
Performs a QR decomposition on the given square matrix, writing a matrix as a product of a unitary matrix Q and upper triangular matrix R

Parameters:
m - the matrix whose QR factorization we wish to compute
Returns:
the array representation {Q, R}
Throws:
NotSquareException

schurDecompose

public static Matrix[] schurDecompose(Matrix m)
                               throws NotSquareException
Computes the Schur decomposition of the matrix, which uses a unitary transform to find a similar triangular matrix

Parameters:
m - the matrix whose Schur decomposition we are computing
Returns:
an array containing the unitary matrix that can transform it to triangular form and the triangular form
Throws:
NotSquareException - the given matrix is not square

luDecompose

public static Matrix[] luDecompose(Matrix m)
                            throws NotSquareException,
                                   NoLUDecompositionException
Computes and returns the LU decomposition of the matrix

Parameters:
m - the matrix whose LU decomposition we are computing
Returns:
the result of the LU decomposition {L,U}
Throws:
NotSquareException - the supplied matrix is not square
NoLUDecompositionException - the supplied square matrix does not admit an LU decomposition

choleskyDecompose

public static Matrix choleskyDecompose(Matrix m)
                                throws NotHermitianException,
                                       NotPositiveDefiniteException
Performs a Cholesky decomposition, which writes a positive definite Hermitian matrix in terms of a lower triangular matrix and its conjugate transpose

Parameters:
m - the matrix whose Cholesky decomposition we wish to compute
Returns:
the lower triangular matrix L in A=LL*
Throws:
NotHermitianException - the given matrix is not Hermitian
NotPositiveDefiniteException - the given matrix is not positive definite
